channel.title: competitions on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in competitions on Argolon Solutions

item.title: LouderVoice at TheNextWeb
item.description: We’re attending TheNextWeb Conference in Amsterdam on June 1st. It looks like it will be an awesome day and we are aiming to show off LouderVoice to a big audience. The organisers have put together an awards site and we’d really appreciate a vote for LouderVoice in the Beta & Stealth Category. Whilst you are there, a vote for Pixenate in the Disruptors Category would make a lot of sense!
